attributes.name: dynamicPropertyId
attributes.description: Shows the unique identifier of the property.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the organization

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type the name of the property.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type a description for the property.

attributes.name: dataType
attributes.description: Select the data type of the property.

attributes.name: defaultValueInteger
attributes.description: Shows the default value of the property for a whole number data type.

attributes.name: defaultValueString
attributes.description: Shows the default value of the property for a string data type.

attributes.name: defaultValueDecimal
attributes.description: Shows the default value of the property for a decimal data type.

attributes.name: baseDynamicPropertyId
attributes.description: Shows the property in the product family that this property is being inherited from.

attributes.name: overwrittenDynamicPropertyId
attributes.description: Shows the related overwritten property.

attributes.name: rootDynamicPropertyId
attributes.description: Shows the root property that this property is derived from.

attributes.name: minValueDecimal
attributes.description: Shows the minimum allowed value of the property for a decimal data type.

attributes.name: maxValueDecimal
attributes.description: Shows the maximum allowed value of the property for a decimal data type.

attributes.name: precision
attributes.description: Shows the allowed precision of the property for a whole number data type.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows the state of the property.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the property is active or inactive.

attributes.name: regardingObjectId
attributes.description: Choose the product that the property is associated with.

attributes.name: defaultValueDouble
attributes.description: Shows the default value of the property for a double data type.

attributes.name: minValueDouble
attributes.description: Shows the minimum allowed value of the property for a double data type.

attributes.name: maxValueDouble
attributes.description: Shows the maximum allowed value of the property for a double data type.

attributes.name: minValueInteger
attributes.description: Shows the minimum allowed value of the property for a whole number data type.

attributes.name: maxValueInteger
attributes.description: Shows the maximum allowed value of the property for a whole number data type.

attributes.name: isReadOnly
attributes.description: Defines whether the attribute is read-only or if it can be edited.

attributes.name: isHidden
attributes.description: Defines whether the attribute is hidden or shown.

attributes.name: isRequired
attributes.description: Defines whether the attribute is mandatory.

attributes.name: maxLengthString
attributes.description: Shows the maximum allowed length of the property for a string data type.

attributes.name: defaultValueOptionSet
attributes.description: Shows the default value of the property.
